core

Class CheckBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.CounterAction
      • core.CheckBox

  • public class CheckBox
extends CounterAction
    Popup an input dialog including (multiple) check boxes and stores the input.
    Author:
    csiki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CheckBoxDialog checkBoxDialog
      Dialog box for showing the check boxes and an Ok and a Cancel button.
      private CloudCommentDisplay cloudCommentDisplay
      For displaying lower cloud.
      private CloudCommentPanel cloudCommentPanel
      For displaying lower cloud.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> options
      List of options (texts next to check boxes) to be shown.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> selectedIndexes
      List of selected indexes of the options.

    • Method Detail

      • addOption

        public void addOption(java.lang.String option)
        Adds an extra check box. Call only before triggered!
        Parameters:
        option - text is showed next to the check box.

      • getNumOfSelectedIndexes

        public int getNumOfSelectedIndexes()
        Gets the number of selected check boxes. Call only after triggered!
        Returns:
        number of selected check boxes.

      • getSelectedIndex

        public int getSelectedIndex(int index)
        Gets a selected index of options. Index of the first added check box is 0. Call only after triggered! Because multiple check boxes can be chosen, there are multiple selected indexes in a list. This method helps getting the items of that list.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the selected indexes (from 0 to getNumOfSelectedIndexes()).
        Returns:
        index of a selected option (from 0 to the number of added options).

      • getSelectedText

        public java.lang.String getSelectedText(int index)
        Gets a selected options text. Call only after triggered! Same as int getSelectedIndex(int index), but it returns the exact option string, while the other gets the index of the added options (which is/are selected).
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the selected indexes (from 0 to getNumOfSelectedIndexes()).
        Returns:
        text of a selected option.

      • isIndexSelected

        public boolean isIndexSelected(int index)
        Gets if an index is selected.
        Parameters:
        index - of the option
        Returns:
        true if the given index was selected, false otherwise

      • isOptionSelected

        public boolean isOptionSelected(java.lang.String option)
        Gets if the given option is selected.
        Parameters:
        option - string
        Returns:
        true if the given option is selected, false otherwise

      • trigger

        public void trigger()
        Shows window including the check boxes for the user, waits till input is given.
        Specified by:
        trigger in class CounterAction
